name: Flying Red Panda
description:
Flying Red Panda is an endless flight game featuring a cute character named "Aiko".

Meet Aiko, she is obsessed with Pandas. She loves them so much in fact, that she believes she is one. That's not the only thing that Aiko is obsessed with, no. Aiko often has a dream of flying, and would like nothing more than to be able to fly. These two obsessions have lead Aiko into building a home-made Rocketpack and now her dream of flight is possible.
Use your skills and the wisdom of the Panda to guide Aiko through her journey. Collect coins and crates to earn points. Avoid TNT, trash and some crazy fishermen on their bikes to survive.
